about_the_game:
Dopamine is an exciting roguelike that plunges you into the whirlwind of the mind, exploring the vast universe of dopamine. Face challenges, make strategic decisions, and free yourself from the shackles of temptation as you strive to achieve your aspirations.


Build your deck with over 200 unique cards and confront various random events, each with multiple choices that can either help or hinder your journey. During the game, make strategic choices when selecting the cards that will compose your deck, as both events and items interact with cards, requiring wise decisions.


At the beginning of each match, the player is faced with the choice of an aspiration. This choice defines a powerful initial item for your journey. The goal is to build an incredible deck to overcome all temptations and obstacles, ultimately achieving the chosen aspiration.

Features

  • Build Your Deck: After each battle, choose wisely from over 200 cards to build a deck that adapts to your strategy and the ever-changing environment.
  • Random Events: Encounter unpredictable events, each with multiple choices that can directly impact your progression.
  • Strategic Choices: Make wise decisions when interacting with events, items, and cards to maximize your chances of success.
  • Unlockables: Expand your card collection as you progress, unlocking new possibilities with each match and enhancing your deck.

Extreme Replayability

  • 6 initial aspirations.
  • 50+ random events.
  • 200+ implemented cards.
  • 100+ different items to discover.
  • 50+ unique battles.
